text:
It seems that <mail> task generates incorrect 'Date:' header

* Ant 1.4.1 generates: 
(correct)
Date: Thu, 06 Jun 2002 19:15:28 +0300 (EEST)

* Ant 1.5betaX generates: 
(incorrect)
Date: Thu Jun 06 19:15:28 EEST 2002

It causes bug during displaying 
Sent/Created field
in some mailers
(at least in my mailer the minutes influence on year,
so 
I see year==2015 in case of examples above).
creator: viy75@ukr.net
bodewig@apache.org

text:
I've been expecting too much from SimpleDateFormat, it seems.  The result of "z"
doesn't conform to the SMTP RFC.

Ant 1.4.1 didn't even try to set the Date header and left it to the mail-server,
which worked for you.

<http://cvs.apache.org/~bodewig/gump/ant1.5beta/20020619/> should finally work.
